name: Shelf Help
description:
Test your sortitude in a never-ending gauntlet of heart-pounding librarian action.

Fight for one of 26 alphabetical ranks. Do you have what it takes to become a Zealous Zenith? Alright, excellent, but tell me with your indoor voice, please.

In Game A: Putaway,

You're given book after book that needs putting in their proper places.

In Game B: Organize, 

You're given shelf after shelf of books that have been scrambled, (probably by someone who thought they were helping,) and you need to set them right.

Who here needs a quick refresher on how to sort books?

Books are typically sorted by the author's last name, the author's first name, and then the title (Ignoring words like 'a' and 'the')

Updates planned and forthcoming!

Special shout-out to the Edmonton Public Library for their feedback and encouragement, and also for just being an unquestionably excellent library.
